17
18#ifndef _UNINAME_H
19#define _UNINAME_H
20
21/* Required size of buffer for a Unicode character name. */
22#define UNINAME_MAX 256
23
24/* Looks up the name of a Unicode character, in uppercase ASCII.
25 Returns the filled buf, or NULL if the character does not have a name. */
26extern char * unicode_character_name (unsigned int uc, char *buf);
27
28/* Looks up the Unicode character with a given name, in upper- or lowercase
29 ASCII. Returns the character if found, or UNINAME_INVALID if not found. */
30extern unsigned int unicode_name_character (const char *name);
31#define UNINAME_INVALID ((unsigned int) 0xFFFF)
32
33#endif /* _UNINAME_H */
34
